"er" - A clothes hanger that can also serve as a mini clothes dryer, using a built-in fan to circulate hot air and dry clothes quickly and efficiently.
"er" - A clothes hanger with a built-in ironing board, allowing for easy and convenient ironing of clothes while they hang.
"er" - A clothes hanger with a built-in steamer, allowing for easy and convenient steaming of clothes while they hang.
"er" - A clothes hanger with a built-in washing machine, allowing for easy and convenient washing of clothes while they hang.
"er" - A clothes hanger with a built-in spinning dryer, allowing for easy and convenient drying of clothes while they hang.
